62 // when we ask cxxopts to use Unicode, help strings are processed using ICU,
63 // which results in the correct lengths being computed for strings when they
64 // are formatted for the help output
65 // it is necessary to make sure that <unicode/unistr.h> can be found by the
66 // compiler, and that icu-uc is linked in to the binary.
67 
68 #ifdef CXXOPTS_USE_UNICODE
69 #include <unicode/unistr.h>
70 
71 namespace cxxopts {
72 typedef icu::UnicodeString String;
73 
74 inline String toLocalString(std::string s) {
75  return icu::UnicodeString::fromUTF8(std::move(s));
76 }
77 
78 class UnicodeStringIterator
79  : public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, int32_t> {
80 public:
81  UnicodeStringIterator(const icu::UnicodeString *string, int32_t pos)
82  : s(string), i(pos) {}
83 
84  value_type operator*() const { return s->char32At(i); }
85 
86  bool operator==(const UnicodeStringIterator &rhs) const {
87  return s == rhs.s && i == rhs.i;
88  }
89 
90  bool operator!=(const UnicodeStringIterator &rhs) const {
91  return !(*this == rhs);
92  }
93 
94  UnicodeStringIterator &operator++() {
95  ++i;
96  return *this;
97  }
98 
99  UnicodeStringIterator operator+(int32_t v) {
100  return UnicodeStringIterator(s, i + v);
101  }
102 
103 private:
104  const icu::UnicodeString *s;
105  int32_t i;
106 };
107 
108 inline String &stringAppend(String &s, String a) {
109  return s.append(std::move(a));
110 }
111 
112 inline String &stringAppend(String &s, int n, UChar32 c) {
113  for (int i = 0; i != n; ++i) {
114  s.append(c);
115  }
116 
117  return s;
118 }
119 
120 template <typename Iterator>
121 String &stringAppend(String &s, Iterator begin, Iterator end) {
122  while (begin != end) {
123  s.append(*begin);
124  ++begin;
125  }
126 
127  return s;
128 }
129 
130 inline size_t stringLength(const String &s) { return s.length(); }
131 
132 inline std::string toUTF8String(const String &s) {
133  std::string result;
134  s.toUTF8String(result);
135 
136  return result;
137 }
138 
139 inline bool empty(const String &s) { return s.isEmpty(); }
140 } // namespace cxxopts

317 namespace values {
318 namespace {
319 std::basic_regex<char> integer_pattern("(-)?(0x)?([0-9a-zA-Z]+)|((0x)?0)");
320 std::basic_regex<char> truthy_pattern("(t|T)(rue)?|1");
321 std::basic_regex<char> falsy_pattern("(f|F)(alse)?|0");
322 } // namespace
323 
324 namespace detail {
325 template <typename T, bool B> struct SignedCheck;
326 
327 template <typename T> struct SignedCheck<T, true> {
328  template <typename U>
329  void operator()(bool negative, U u, const std::string &text) {
330  if (negative) {
331  if (u > static_cast<U>((std::numeric_limits<T>::min)())) {
332  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
333  }
334  } else {
335  if (u > static_cast<U>((std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())) {
336  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
337  }
338  }
339  }
340 };
341 
342 template <typename T> struct SignedCheck<T, false> {
343  template <typename U> void operator()(bool, U, const std::string &) {}
344 };
345 
346 template <typename T, typename U>
347 void check_signed_range(bool negative, U value, const std::string &text) {
348  SignedCheck<T, std::numeric_limits<T>::is_signed>()(negative, value, text);
349 }
350 } // namespace detail
351 
352 template <typename R, typename T>
353 R checked_negate(T &&t, const std::string &, std::true_type) {
354  // if we got to here, then `t` is a positive number that fits into
355  // `R`. So to avoid MSVC C4146, we first cast it to `R`.
356  // See https://github.com/jarro2783/cxxopts/issues/62 for more details.
357  return -static_cast<R>(t - 1) - 1;
358 }
359 
360 template <typename R, typename T>
361 T checked_negate(T &&, const std::string &text, std::false_type) {
362  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
363 }
364 
365 template <typename T> void integer_parser(const std::string &text, T &value) {
366  std::smatch match;
367  std::regex_match(text, match, integer_pattern);
368 
369  if (match.length() == 0) {
370  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
371  }
372 
373  if (match.length(4) > 0) {
374  value = 0;
375  return;
376  }
377 
378  using US = typename std::make_unsigned<T>::type;
379 
380  constexpr bool is_signed = std::numeric_limits<T>::is_signed;
381  const bool negative = match.length(1) > 0;
382  const uint8_t base = match.length(2) > 0 ? 16 : 10;
383 
384  auto value_match = match[3];
385 
386  US result = 0;
387 
388  for (auto iter = value_match.first; iter != value_match.second; ++iter) {
389  US digit = 0;
390 
391  if (*iter >= '0' && *iter <= '9') {
392  digit = static_cast<US>(*iter - '0');
393  } else if (base == 16 && *iter >= 'a' && *iter <= 'f') {
394  digit = static_cast<US>(*iter - 'a' + 10);
395  } else if (base == 16 && *iter >= 'A' && *iter <= 'F') {
396  digit = static_cast<US>(*iter - 'A' + 10);
397  } else {
398  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
399  }
400 
401  US next = result * base + digit;
402  if (result > next) {
403  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
404  }
405 
406  result = next;
407  }
408 
409  detail::check_signed_range<T>(negative, result, text);
410 
411  if (negative) {
412  value = checked_negate<T>(result, text,
413  std::integral_constant<bool, is_signed>());
414  } else {
415  value = static_cast<T>(result);
416  }
417 }
418 
419 template <typename T>
420 void stringstream_parser(const std::string &text, T &value) {
421  std::stringstream in(text);
422  in >> value;
423  if (!in) {
424  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
425  }
426 }
427 
428 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, uint8_t &value) {
429  integer_parser(text, value);
430 }
431 
432 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, int8_t &value) {
433  integer_parser(text, value);
434 }
435 
436 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, uint16_t &value) {
437  integer_parser(text, value);
438 }
439 
440 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, int16_t &value) {
441  integer_parser(text, value);
442 }
443 
444 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, uint32_t &value) {
445  integer_parser(text, value);
446 }
447 
448 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, int32_t &value) {
449  integer_parser(text, value);
450 }
451 
452 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, uint64_t &value) {
453  integer_parser(text, value);
454 }
455 
456 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, int64_t &value) {
457  integer_parser(text, value);
458 }
459 
460 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, bool &value) {
461  std::smatch result;
462  std::regex_match(text, result, truthy_pattern);
463 
464  if (!result.empty()) {
465  value = true;
466  return;
467  }
468 
469  std::regex_match(text, result, falsy_pattern);
470  if (!result.empty()) {
471  value = false;
472  return;
473  }
474 
475  throw argument_incorrect_type(text);
476 }
477 
478 inline void parse_value(const std::string &text, std::string &value) {
479  value = text;
480 }
481 
482 // The fallback parser. It uses the stringstream parser to parse all types
483 // that have not been overloaded explicitly. It has to be placed in the
484 // source code before all other more specialized templates.
485 template <typename T> void parse_value(const std::string &text, T &value) {
486  stringstream_parser(text, value);
487 }
488 
489 template <typename T>
490 void parse_value(const std::string &text, std::vector<T> &value) {
491  std::stringstream in(text);
492  std::string token;
493  while (in.eof() == false &&
494  std::getline(in, token, CXXOPTS_VECTOR_DELIMITER)) {
495  T v;
496  parse_value(token, v);
497  value.emplace_back(std::move(v));
498  }
499 }
500 
501 #ifdef CXXOPTS_HAS_OPTIONAL
502 template <typename T>
503 void parse_value(const std::string &text, std::optional<T> &value) {
504  T result;
505  parse_value(text, result);
506  value = std::move(result);
507 }
508 #endif

510 template <typename T> struct type_is_container {
511  static constexpr bool value = false;
512 };
513 
514 template <typename T> struct type_is_container<std::vector<T>> {
515  static constexpr bool value = true;
516 };
517 
518 template <typename T> class abstract_value : public Value {
519  using Self = abstract_value<T>;
520 
521 public:
522  abstract_value() : m_result(std::make_shared<T>()), m_store(m_result.get()) {}
523 
524  abstract_value(T *t) : m_store(t) {}
525 
526  virtual ~abstract_value() = default;
527 
528  abstract_value(const abstract_value &rhs) {
529  if (rhs.m_result) {
530  m_result = std::make_shared<T>();
531  m_store = m_result.get();
532  } else {
533  m_store = rhs.m_store;
534  }
535 
536  m_default = rhs.m_default;
537  m_implicit = rhs.m_implicit;
538  m_default_value = rhs.m_default_value;
539  m_implicit_value = rhs.m_implicit_value;
540  }
541 
542  void parse(const std::string &text) const { parse_value(text, *m_store); }
543 
544  bool is_container() const { return type_is_container<T>::value; }
545 
546  void parse() const { parse_value(m_default_value, *m_store); }
547 
548  bool has_default() const { return m_default; }
549 
550  bool has_implicit() const { return m_implicit; }
551 
552  std::shared_ptr<Value> default_value(const std::string &value) {
553  m_default = true;
554  m_default_value = value;
555  return shared_from_this();
556  }
557 
558  std::shared_ptr<Value> implicit_value(const std::string &value) {
559  m_implicit = true;
560  m_implicit_value = value;
561  return shared_from_this();
562  }
563 
564  std::shared_ptr<Value> no_implicit_value() {
565  m_implicit = false;
566  return shared_from_this();
567  }
568 
569  std::string get_default_value() const { return m_default_value; }
570 
571  std::string get_implicit_value() const { return m_implicit_value; }
572 
573  bool is_boolean() const { return std::is_same<T, bool>::value; }
574 
575  const T &get() const {
576  if (m_store == nullptr) {
577  return *m_result;
578  } else {
579  return *m_store;
580  }
581  }
582 
583 protected:
584  std::shared_ptr<T> m_result;
585  T *m_store;
586 
587  bool m_default = false;
588  bool m_implicit = false;
589 
590  std::string m_default_value;
591  std::string m_implicit_value;
592 };
593 
594 template <typename T> class standard_value : public abstract_value<T> {
595 public:
596  using abstract_value<T>::abstract_value;
597 
598  std::shared_ptr<Value> clone() const {
599  return std::make_shared<standard_value<T>>(*this);
600  }
601 };
602 
603 template <> class standard_value<bool> : public abstract_value<bool> {
604 public:
605  ~standard_value() = default;
606 
607  standard_value() { set_default_and_implicit(); }
608 
609  standard_value(bool *b) : abstract_value(b) { set_default_and_implicit(); }
610 
611  std::shared_ptr<Value> clone() const {
612  return std::make_shared<standard_value<bool>>(*this);
613  }
614 
615 private:
616  void set_default_and_implicit() {
617  m_default = true;
618  m_default_value = "false";
619  m_implicit = true;
620  m_implicit_value = "true";
621  }
622 };
623 } // namespace values
624 
625 template <typename T> std::shared_ptr<Value> value() {
626  return std::make_shared<values::standard_value<T>>();
627 }
628 
629 template <typename T> std::shared_ptr<Value> value(T &t) {
630  return std::make_shared<values::standard_value<T>>(&t);
631 }

635 class OptionDetails {
636 public:
637  OptionDetails(const std::string &short_, const std::string &long_,
638  const String &desc, std::shared_ptr<const Value> val)
639  : m_short(short_), m_long(long_), m_desc(desc), m_value(val), m_count(0) {
640  }
641 
642  OptionDetails(const OptionDetails &rhs)
643  : m_desc(rhs.m_desc), m_count(rhs.m_count) {
644  m_value = rhs.m_value->clone();
645  }
646 
647  OptionDetails(OptionDetails &&rhs) = default;
648 
649  const String &description() const { return m_desc; }
650 
651  const Value &value() const { return *m_value; }
652 
653  std::shared_ptr<Value> make_storage() const { return m_value->clone(); }
654 
655  const std::string &short_name() const { return m_short; }
656 
657  const std::string &long_name() const { return m_long; }
658 
659 private:
660  std::string m_short;
661  std::string m_long;
662  String m_desc;
663  std::shared_ptr<const Value> m_value;
664  int m_count;
665 };

667 struct HelpOptionDetails {
668  std::string s;
669  std::string l;
670  String desc;
671  bool has_default;
672  std::string default_value;
673  bool has_implicit;
674  std::string implicit_value;
675  std::string arg_help;
676  bool is_container;
677  bool is_boolean;
678 };

680 struct HelpGroupDetails {
681  std::string name;
682  std::string description;
683  std::vector<HelpOptionDetails> options;
684 };
685 
686 class OptionValue {
687 public:
688  void parse(std::shared_ptr<const OptionDetails> details,
689  const std::string &text) {
690  ensure_value(details);
691  ++m_count;
692  m_value->parse(text);
693  }
694 
695  void parse_default(std::shared_ptr<const OptionDetails> details) {
696  ensure_value(details);
697  m_value->parse();
698  }
699 
700  size_t count() const { return m_count; }
701 
702  template <typename T> const T &as() const {
703  if (m_value == nullptr) {
704  throw std::domain_error("No value");
705  }
706 
707 #ifdef CXXOPTS_NO_RTTI
708  return static_cast<const values::standard_value<T> &>(*m_value).get();
709 #else
710  return dynamic_cast<const values::standard_value<T> &>(*m_value).get();
711 #endif
712  }
713 
714 private:
715  void ensure_value(std::shared_ptr<const OptionDetails> details) {
716  if (m_value == nullptr) {
717  m_value = details->make_storage();
718  }
719  }
720 
721  std::shared_ptr<Value> m_value;
722  size_t m_count = 0;
723 };
724 
725 class KeyValue {
726 public:
727  KeyValue(std::string key_, std::string value_)
728  : m_key(std::move(key_)), m_value(std::move(value_)) {}
729 
730  const std::string &key() const { return m_key; }
731 
732  const std::string &value() const { return m_value; }
733 
734  template <typename T> T as() const {
735  T result;
736  values::parse_value(m_value, result);
737  return result;
738  }
739 
740 private:
741  std::string m_key;
742  std::string m_value;
743 };
744 
745 class ParseResult {
746 public:
747  ParseResult(
748  const std::shared_ptr<
749  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails>>>,
750  std::vector<std::string>, bool allow_unrecognised, int &, char **&);
751 
752  size_t count(const std::string &o) const {
753  auto iter = m_options->find(o);
754  if (iter == m_options->end()) {
755  return 0;
756  }
757 
758  auto riter = m_results.find(iter->second);
759 
760  return riter->second.count();
761  }
762 
763  const OptionValue &operator[](const std::string &option) const {
764  auto iter = m_options->find(option);
765 
766  if (iter == m_options->end()) {
767  throw option_not_present_exception(option);
768  }
769 
770  auto riter = m_results.find(iter->second);
771 
772  return riter->second;
773  }
774 
775  const std::vector<KeyValue> &arguments() const { return m_sequential; }
776 
777 private:
778  void parse(int &argc, char **&argv);
779 
780  void add_to_option(const std::string &option, const std::string &arg);
781 
782  bool consume_positional(std::string a);
783 
784  void parse_option(std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> value,
785  const std::string &name, const std::string &arg = "");
786 
787  void parse_default(std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> details);
788 
789  void checked_parse_arg(int argc, char *argv[], int &current,
790  std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> value,
791  const std::string &name);
792 
793  const std::shared_ptr<
794  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails>>>
795  m_options;
796  std::vector<std::string> m_positional;
797  std::vector<std::string>::iterator m_next_positional;
798  std::unordered_set<std::string> m_positional_set;
799  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails>, OptionValue> m_results;
800 
801  bool m_allow_unrecognised;
802 
803  std::vector<KeyValue> m_sequential;
804 };
805 
806 struct Option {
807  Option(const std::string &opts, const std::string &desc,
808  const std::shared_ptr<const Value> &value = ::cxxopts::value<bool>(),
809  const std::string &arg_help = "")
810  : opts_(opts), desc_(desc), value_(value), arg_help_(arg_help) {}
811 
812  std::string opts_;
813  std::string desc_;
814  std::shared_ptr<const Value> value_;
815  std::string arg_help_;
816 };
817 
818 class Options {
819  typedef std::unordered_map<std::string, std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails>>
820  OptionMap;
821 
822 public:
823  Options(std::string program, std::string help_string = "")
824  : m_program(std::move(program)),
825  m_help_string(toLocalString(std::move(help_string))),
826  m_custom_help("[OPTION...]"),
827  m_positional_help("positional parameters"), m_show_positional(false),
828  m_allow_unrecognised(false), m_options(std::make_shared<OptionMap>()),
829  m_next_positional(m_positional.end()) {}
830 
831  Options &positional_help(std::string help_text) {
832  m_positional_help = std::move(help_text);
833  return *this;
834  }
835 
836  Options &custom_help(std::string help_text) {
837  m_custom_help = std::move(help_text);
838  return *this;
839  }
840 
841  Options &show_positional_help() {
842  m_show_positional = true;
843  return *this;
844  }
845 
846  Options &allow_unrecognised_options() {
847  m_allow_unrecognised = true;
848  return *this;
849  }
850 
851  ParseResult parse(int &argc, char **&argv);
852 
853  OptionAdder add_options(std::string group = "");
854 
855  void add_options(const std::string &group,
856  std::initializer_list<Option> options);
857 
858  void add_option(const std::string &group, const Option &option);
859 
860  void add_option(const std::string &group, const std::string &s,
861  const std::string &l, std::string desc,
862  std::shared_ptr<const Value> value, std::string arg_help);
863 
864  // parse positional arguments into the given option
865  void parse_positional(std::string option);
866 
867  void parse_positional(std::vector<std::string> options);
868 
869  void parse_positional(std::initializer_list<std::string> options);
870 
871  template <typename Iterator>
872  void parse_positional(Iterator begin, Iterator end) {
873  parse_positional(std::vector<std::string>{begin, end});
874  }
875 
876  std::string help(const std::vector<std::string> &groups = {}) const;
877 
878  const std::vector<std::string> groups() const;
879 
880  const HelpGroupDetails &group_help(const std::string &group) const;
881 
882 private:
883  void add_one_option(const std::string &option,
884  std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> details);
885 
886  String help_one_group(const std::string &group) const;
887 
888  void generate_group_help(String &result,
889  const std::vector<std::string> &groups) const;
890 
891  void generate_all_groups_help(String &result) const;
892 
893  std::string m_program;
894  String m_help_string;
895  std::string m_custom_help;
896  std::string m_positional_help;
897  bool m_show_positional;
898  bool m_allow_unrecognised;
899 
900  std::shared_ptr<OptionMap> m_options;
901  std::vector<std::string> m_positional;
902  std::vector<std::string>::iterator m_next_positional;
903  std::unordered_set<std::string> m_positional_set;
904 
905  // mapping from groups to help options
906  std::map<std::string, HelpGroupDetails> m_help;
907 };
908 
909 class OptionAdder {
910 public:
911  OptionAdder(Options &options, std::string group)
912  : m_options(options), m_group(std::move(group)) {}
913 
914  OptionAdder &
915  operator()(const std::string &opts, const std::string &desc,
916  std::shared_ptr<const Value> value = ::cxxopts::value<bool>(),
917  std::string arg_help = "");
918 
919 private:
920  Options &m_options;
921  std::string m_group;
922 };
923 
924 namespace {
925 constexpr int OPTION_LONGEST = 30;
926 constexpr int OPTION_DESC_GAP = 2;
927 
928 std::basic_regex<char>
929  option_matcher("--([[:alnum:]][-_[:alnum:]]+)(=(.*))?|-([[:alnum:]]+)");
930 
931 std::basic_regex<char>
932  option_specifier("(([[:alnum:]]),)?[ ]*([[:alnum:]][-_[:alnum:]]*)?");
933 
934 String format_option(const HelpOptionDetails &o) {
935  auto &s = o.s;
936  auto &l = o.l;
937 
938  String result = " ";
939 
940  if (s.size() > 0) {
941  result += "-" + toLocalString(s) + ",";
942  } else {
943  result += " ";
944  }
945 
946  if (l.size() > 0) {
947  result += " --" + toLocalString(l);
948  }
949 
950  auto arg = o.arg_help.size() > 0 ? toLocalString(o.arg_help) : "arg";
951 
952  if (!o.is_boolean) {
953  if (o.has_implicit) {
954  result += " [=" + arg + "(=" + toLocalString(o.implicit_value) + ")]";
955  } else {
956  result += " " + arg;
957  }
958  }
959 
960  return result;
961 }
962 
963 String format_description(const HelpOptionDetails &o, size_t start,
964  size_t width) {
965  auto desc = o.desc;
966 
967  if (o.has_default && (!o.is_boolean || o.default_value != "false")) {
968  desc += toLocalString(" (default: " + o.default_value + ")");
969  }
970 
971  String result;
972 
973  auto current = std::begin(desc);
974  auto startLine = current;
975  auto lastSpace = current;
976 
977  auto size = size_t{};
978 
979  while (current != std::end(desc)) {
980  if (*current == ' ') {
981  lastSpace = current;
982  }
983 
984  if (*current == '\n') {
985  startLine = current + 1;
986  lastSpace = startLine;
987  } else if (size > width) {
988  if (lastSpace == startLine) {
989  stringAppend(result, startLine, current + 1);
990  stringAppend(result, "\n");
991  stringAppend(result, start, ' ');
992  startLine = current + 1;
993  lastSpace = startLine;
994  } else {
995  stringAppend(result, startLine, lastSpace);
996  stringAppend(result, "\n");
997  stringAppend(result, start, ' ');
998  startLine = lastSpace + 1;
999  }
1000  size = 0;
1001  } else {
1002  ++size;
1003  }
1004 
1005  ++current;
1006  }
1007 
1008  // append whatever is left
1009  stringAppend(result, startLine, current);
1010 
1011  return result;
1012 }
1013 } // namespace
1014 
1015 inline ParseResult::ParseResult(
1016  const std::shared_ptr<
1017  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails>>>
1018  options,
1019  std::vector<std::string> positional, bool allow_unrecognised, int &argc,
1020  char **&argv)
1021  : m_options(options), m_positional(std::move(positional)),
1022  m_next_positional(m_positional.begin()),
1023  m_allow_unrecognised(allow_unrecognised) {
1024  parse(argc, argv);
1025 }
1026 
1027 inline void Options::add_options(const std::string &group,
1028  std::initializer_list<Option> options) {
1029  OptionAdder option_adder(*this, group);
1030  for (const auto &option : options) {
1031  option_adder(option.opts_, option.desc_, option.value_, option.arg_help_);
1032  }
1033 }
1034 
1035 inline OptionAdder Options::add_options(std::string group) {
1036  return OptionAdder(*this, std::move(group));
1037 }
1038 
1039 inline OptionAdder &OptionAdder::operator()(const std::string &opts,
1040  const std::string &desc,
1041  std::shared_ptr<const Value> value,
1042  std::string arg_help) {
1043  std::match_results<const char *> result;
1044  std::regex_match(opts.c_str(), result, option_specifier);
1045 
1046  if (result.empty()) {
1047  throw invalid_option_format_error(opts);
1048  }
1049 
1050  const auto &short_match = result[2];
1051  const auto &long_match = result[3];
1052 
1053  if (!short_match.length() && !long_match.length()) {
1054  throw invalid_option_format_error(opts);
1055  } else if (long_match.length() == 1 && short_match.length()) {
1056  throw invalid_option_format_error(opts);
1057  }
1058 
1059  auto option_names = [](const std::sub_match<const char *> &short_,
1060  const std::sub_match<const char *> &long_) {
1061  if (long_.length() == 1) {
1062  return std::make_tuple(long_.str(), short_.str());
1063  } else {
1064  return std::make_tuple(short_.str(), long_.str());
1065  }
1066  }(short_match, long_match);
1067 
1068  m_options.add_option(m_group, std::get<0>(option_names),
1069  std::get<1>(option_names), desc, value,
1070  std::move(arg_help));
1071 
1072  return *this;
1073 }
1074 
1075 inline void ParseResult::parse_default(std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> details) {
1076  m_results[details].parse_default(details);
1077 }
1078 
1079 inline void ParseResult::parse_option(std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> value,
1080  const std::string & /*name*/,
1081  const std::string &arg) {
1082  auto &result = m_results[value];
1083  result.parse(value, arg);
1084 
1085  m_sequential.emplace_back(value->long_name(), arg);
1086 }
1087 
1088 inline void ParseResult::checked_parse_arg(int argc, char *argv[], int &current,
1089  std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> value,
1090  const std::string &name) {
1091  if (current + 1 >= argc) {
1092  if (value->value().has_implicit()) {
1093  parse_option(value, name, value->value().get_implicit_value());
1094  } else {
1095  throw missing_argument_exception(name);
1096  }
1097  } else {
1098  if (value->value().has_implicit()) {
1099  parse_option(value, name, value->value().get_implicit_value());
1100  } else {
1101  parse_option(value, name, argv[current + 1]);
1102  ++current;
1103  }
1104  }
1105 }
1106 
1107 inline void ParseResult::add_to_option(const std::string &option,
1108  const std::string &arg) {
1109  auto iter = m_options->find(option);
1110 
1111  if (iter == m_options->end()) {
1112  throw option_not_exists_exception(option);
1113  }
1114 
1115  parse_option(iter->second, option, arg);
1116 }
1117 
1118 inline bool ParseResult::consume_positional(std::string a) {
1119  while (m_next_positional != m_positional.end()) {
1120  auto iter = m_options->find(*m_next_positional);
1121  if (iter != m_options->end()) {
1122  auto &result = m_results[iter->second];
1123  if (!iter->second->value().is_container()) {
1124  if (result.count() == 0) {
1125  add_to_option(*m_next_positional, a);
1126  ++m_next_positional;
1127  return true;
1128  } else {
1129  ++m_next_positional;
1130  continue;
1131  }
1132  } else {
1133  add_to_option(*m_next_positional, a);
1134  return true;
1135  }
1136  } else {
1137  throw option_not_exists_exception(*m_next_positional);
1138  }
1139  }
1140 
1141  return false;
1142 }
1143 
1144 inline void Options::parse_positional(std::string option) {
1145  parse_positional(std::vector<std::string>{std::move(option)});
1146 }
1147 
1148 inline void Options::parse_positional(std::vector<std::string> options) {
1149  m_positional = std::move(options);
1150  m_next_positional = m_positional.begin();
1151 
1152  m_positional_set.insert(m_positional.begin(), m_positional.end());
1153 }
1154 
1155 inline void
1156 Options::parse_positional(std::initializer_list<std::string> options) {
1157  parse_positional(std::vector<std::string>(std::move(options)));
1158 }
1159 
1160 inline ParseResult Options::parse(int &argc, char **&argv) {
1161  ParseResult result(m_options, m_positional, m_allow_unrecognised, argc, argv);
1162  return result;
1163 }
1164 
1165 inline void ParseResult::parse(int &argc, char **&argv) {
1166  int current = 1;
1167 
1168  int nextKeep = 1;
1169 
1170  bool consume_remaining = false;
1171 
1172  while (current != argc) {
1173  if (strcmp(argv[current], "--") == 0) {
1174  consume_remaining = true;
1175  ++current;
1176  break;
1177  }
1178 
1179  std::match_results<const char *> result;
1180  std::regex_match(argv[current], result, option_matcher);
1181 
1182  if (result.empty()) {
1183  // not a flag
1184 
1185  // but if it starts with a `-`, then it's an error
1186  if (argv[current][0] == '-' && argv[current][1] != '\0') {
1187  if (!m_allow_unrecognised) {
1188  throw option_syntax_exception(argv[current]);
1189  }
1190  }
1191 
1192  // if true is returned here then it was consumed, otherwise it is
1193  // ignored
1194  if (consume_positional(argv[current])) {
1195  } else {
1196  argv[nextKeep] = argv[current];
1197  ++nextKeep;
1198  }
1199  // if we return from here then it was parsed successfully, so continue
1200  } else {
1201  // short or long option?
1202  if (result[4].length() != 0) {
1203  const std::string &s = result[4];
1204 
1205  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != s.size(); ++i) {
1206  std::string name(1, s[i]);
1207  auto iter = m_options->find(name);
1208 
1209  if (iter == m_options->end()) {
1210  if (m_allow_unrecognised) {
1211  continue;
1212  } else {
1213  // error
1214  throw option_not_exists_exception(name);
1215  }
1216  }
1217 
1218  auto value = iter->second;
1219 
1220  if (i + 1 == s.size()) {
1221  // it must be the last argument
1222  checked_parse_arg(argc, argv, current, value, name);
1223  } else if (value->value().has_implicit()) {
1224  parse_option(value, name, value->value().get_implicit_value());
1225  } else {
1226  // error
1227  throw option_requires_argument_exception(name);
1228  }
1229  }
1230  } else if (result[1].length() != 0) {
1231  const std::string &name = result[1];
1232 
1233  auto iter = m_options->find(name);
1234 
1235  if (iter == m_options->end()) {
1236  if (m_allow_unrecognised) {
1237  // keep unrecognised options in argument list, skip to next argument
1238  argv[nextKeep] = argv[current];
1239  ++nextKeep;
1240  ++current;
1241  continue;
1242  } else {
1243  // error
1244  throw option_not_exists_exception(name);
1245  }
1246  }
1247 
1248  auto opt = iter->second;
1249 
1250  // equals provided for long option?
1251  if (result[2].length() != 0) {
1252  // parse the option given
1253 
1254  parse_option(opt, name, result[3]);
1255  } else {
1256  // parse the next argument
1257  checked_parse_arg(argc, argv, current, opt, name);
1258  }
1259  }
1260  }
1261 
1262  ++current;
1263  }
1264 
1265  for (auto &opt : *m_options) {
1266  auto &detail = opt.second;
1267  auto &value = detail->value();
1268 
1269  auto &store = m_results[detail];
1270 
1271  if (!store.count() && value.has_default()) {
1272  parse_default(detail);
1273  }
1274  }
1275 
1276  if (consume_remaining) {
1277  while (current < argc) {
1278  if (!consume_positional(argv[current])) {
1279  break;
1280  }
1281  ++current;
1282  }
1283 
1284  // adjust argv for any that couldn't be swallowed
1285  while (current != argc) {
1286  argv[nextKeep] = argv[current];
1287  ++nextKeep;
1288  ++current;
1289  }
1290  }
1291 
1292  argc = nextKeep;
1293 }
1294 
1295 inline void Options::add_option(const std::string &group,
1296  const Option &option) {
1297  add_options(group, {option});
1298 }
1299 
1300 inline void Options::add_option(const std::string &group, const std::string &s,
1301  const std::string &l, std::string desc,
1302  std::shared_ptr<const Value> value,
1303  std::string arg_help) {
1304  auto stringDesc = toLocalString(std::move(desc));
1305  auto option = std::make_shared<OptionDetails>(s, l, stringDesc, value);
1306 
1307  if (s.size() > 0) {
1308  add_one_option(s, option);
1309  }
1310 
1311  if (l.size() > 0) {
1312  add_one_option(l, option);
1313  }
1314 
1315  // add the help details
1316  auto &options = m_help[group];
1317 
1318  options.options.emplace_back(HelpOptionDetails{
1319  s, l, stringDesc, value->has_default(), value->get_default_value(),
1320  value->has_implicit(), value->get_implicit_value(), std::move(arg_help),
1321  value->is_container(), value->is_boolean()});
1322 }
1323 
1324 inline void Options::add_one_option(const std::string &option,
1325  std::shared_ptr<OptionDetails> details) {
1326  auto in = m_options->emplace(option, details);
1327 
1328  if (!in.second) {
1329  throw option_exists_error(option);
1330  }
1331 }
1332 
1333 inline String Options::help_one_group(const std::string &g) const {
1334  typedef std::vector<std::pair<String, String>> OptionHelp;
1335 
1336  auto group = m_help.find(g);
1337  if (group == m_help.end()) {
1338  return "";
1339  }
1340 
1341  OptionHelp format;
1342 
1343  size_t longest = 0;
1344 
1345  String result;
1346 
1347  if (!g.empty()) {
1348  result += toLocalString(" " + g + " options:\n");
1349  }
1350 
1351  for (const auto &o : group->second.options) {
1352  if (m_positional_set.find(o.l) != m_positional_set.end() &&
1353  !m_show_positional) {
1354  continue;
1355  }
1356 
1357  auto s = format_option(o);
1358  longest = (std::max)(longest, stringLength(s));
1359  format.push_back(std::make_pair(s, String()));
1360  }
1361 
1362  longest = (std::min)(longest, static_cast<size_t>(OPTION_LONGEST));
1363 
1364  // widest allowed description
1365  auto allowed = size_t{76} - longest - OPTION_DESC_GAP;
1366 
1367  auto fiter = format.begin();
1368  for (const auto &o : group->second.options) {
1369  if (m_positional_set.find(o.l) != m_positional_set.end() &&
1370  !m_show_positional) {
1371  continue;
1372  }
1373 
1374  auto d = format_description(o, longest + OPTION_DESC_GAP, allowed);
1375 
1376  result += fiter->first;
1377  if (stringLength(fiter->first) > longest) {
1378  result += '\n';
1379  result += toLocalString(std::string(longest + OPTION_DESC_GAP, ' '));
1380  } else {
1381  result += toLocalString(std::string(
1382  longest + OPTION_DESC_GAP - stringLength(fiter->first), ' '));
1383  }
1384  result += d;
1385  result += '\n';
1386 
1387  ++fiter;
1388  }
1389 
1390  return result;
1391 }
1392 
1393 inline void Options::generate_group_help(
1394  String &result, const std::vector<std::string> &print_groups) const {
1395  for (size_t i = 0; i != print_groups.size(); ++i) {
1396  const String &group_help_text = help_one_group(print_groups[i]);
1397  if (empty(group_help_text)) {
1398  continue;
1399  }
1400  result += group_help_text;
1401  if (i < print_groups.size() - 1) {
1402  result += '\n';
1403  }
1404  }
1405 }
1406 
1407 inline void Options::generate_all_groups_help(String &result) const {
1408  std::vector<std::string> all_groups;
1409  all_groups.reserve(m_help.size());
1410 
1411  for (auto &group : m_help) {
1412  all_groups.push_back(group.first);
1413  }
1414 
1415  generate_group_help(result, all_groups);
1416 }
1417 
1418 inline std::string
1419 Options::help(const std::vector<std::string> &help_groups) const {
1420  String result = m_help_string + "\nUsage:\n " + toLocalString(m_program) +
1421  " " + toLocalString(m_custom_help);
1422 
1423  if (m_positional.size() > 0 && m_positional_help.size() > 0) {
1424  result += " " + toLocalString(m_positional_help);
1425  }
1426 
1427  result += "\n\n";
1428 
1429  if (help_groups.size() == 0) {
1430  generate_all_groups_help(result);
1431  } else {
1432  generate_group_help(result, help_groups);
1433  }
1434 
1435  return toUTF8String(result);
1436 }
1437 
1438 inline const std::vector<std::string> Options::groups() const {
1439  std::vector<std::string> g;
1440 
1441  std::transform(
1442  m_help.begin(), m_help.end(), std::back_inserter(g),
1443  [](const std::map<std::string, HelpGroupDetails>::value_type &pair) {
1444  return pair.first;
1445  });
1446 
1447  return g;
1448 }
1449 
1450 inline const HelpGroupDetails &
1451 Options::group_help(const std::string &group) const {
1452  return m_help.at(group);
1453 }
1454 
1455 } // namespace cxxopts
1456 
1457 #endif // CXXOPTS_HPP_INCLUDED
